name: Disarmed (Movement Feedback Demo)
description:
DISARMED is a fast paced low poly first person shooter in development.

The game is focused around the main mechanic of your only weapon being the arms of your enemies. Acquire weapons by tearing off an enemy's arm, and either impaling or spearing enemies. Traverse the arena with a variety of movement options such as jumping, dashing and ground slamming.

THIS GAME IS CURRENTLY IN DEVELOPMENT, AND THIS IS ONLY A DEMO FOR THE MOVEMENT. FEEDBACK IS VERY APPRECIATED.

Controls (controller not yet supported)

Movement - WASD
Jump - Space
Dash - LShift
Directional Dash - LShift + WASD
Ground Slam - LCtrl

Exit Game - Alt F4
